abstract: The gene modulation and magnetic beads businesses will become part of GE Healthcare, and help General Electric offer new medicines, vaccines and diagnostics as part of its expanding life sciences business.
snippet: The gene modulation and magnetic beads businesses will become part of GE Healthcare, and help General Electric offer new medicines, vaccines and diagnostics as part of its expanding life sciences business.
lead_paragraph: General Electric said on Monday that it would acquire a gene modulation and magnetic beads business from Thermo Fisher Scientific for about $1.06 billion.

headline.main: G.E. to Buy Health Care Units From Thermo Fisher Scientific
